overview_of_class: French 121-2 is the second quarter of a three-quarter course for students who have completed French 121-1 or have been placed in that course by the French department. The aim of the course is to develop students' communication skills and cultural knowledge. Class meets four times a week. No P/N allowed. The last quarter of the sequence (125-3) allows you/sudents to satisfy the WCAS language requirement (grade of C- or higher).
name: Intermediate French
subject: FRENCH
